entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 07:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: NNE 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
